desc: Malibu Mud® face and body masks will detox, cleanse and rejuvenate your skin better than any face or body soap. Use daily for smooth and healthy skin. Made in SoCal of 100% all-natural or certified organic ingredients. Proud to be a USA small business. 🇺🇸 We operate with integrity, honesty and kindness.
